description: My place is located by Columbia University College of Physicians and Surgeons, the neighborhood is filled with great restaurants and cafe. The apartment in conveniently located 3 blocks from the express A subway line and C and 1 local wine, you will be downtown is less then 20 min. This bright and spacious apartment is in the heart of a great neighborhood, and the bed is so comfy. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Spacious and bright 1 BR, super comfy bed!
review: Nelly was very responsive and accommodating throughout our stay. The apartment is in a very nice location for Washington Heights, close grocery stores and restaurants and the 168th st subway stop. The inside of the apartment was very, very spacious and clean with all the essentials, and Nelly offered to provide extra when we asked. Unfortunately the TV was not working when we were there but that was not a big problem. I highly recommend staying at Nelly's apartment.
